title: Pentakill Sona needs a proper rework!
body:
Has anyone seen Pentakill Sona?! IT'S A TOTAL RIP AT 975RP!
The skin looks horrible in game! There's no voice change and she has same spell sounds and no new animation? Why does it cost 975RP!? 
She's supposed to be rock/metal inspired but floats around playing lovely soothing piano music? She looks worse than the default Sona. ðŸ˜‘
I think Riot should at least change the colour of the spells if they don't want to compliment sounds to the skin ðŸ˜§

The skin has so much potential. It's such a good idea but they haven't done it justice. It's just plain horrible. I hope they rework it properly next time.

replies.body: 975 RP when it was released, just so we are clear it's up to standard, current 975's come with new animations, but no new voice over's to my knowledge.

It's a death metal Sona skin!
She should be playing dark music. 
Not her original piano like tunes..

It's so wrong when you see it. 
https://youtu.be/dv6DqHderq8


You're right, not all 975RP skins have voice changes, but they at least have some sort of animation change to accommodate the theme. 
Pentakill Sona has nothing! ðŸ˜¢
She still has same spell animations and sounds. It just spoils the theme.

>
> 975 RP when it was released, just so we are clear it's up to standard, current 975's come with new animations, but no new voice over's to my knowledge.

To elaborate on this; The skin was released in 2010, 5 years ago! Skin prices maintain their release value as to keep their original purchases value. As another user posted Gentlemen Cho'gath also has a similar issue. In addition to this Riot finds RP refunds messy for some reason. 

The video you provided was a texture update last year and was never meant to alter anything but the 5 year old textures so they matched the new updated summoners rift. Her Etwahl has always had mismatched sounds on most of her skins.

Don't expect Riot to reduce the price or update the skin until they do a champion Visual Update. While you wait for that to happen why not listen to some  [Smite And Ignite](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oUiOylPbfV0&list=PLbAFXJC0J5Gb9hzEYU5buZd4udIuIUheP) in the background.
